Detailed Description

cvmx_nqm_vf::_sq::_prp

NQM_VF(x)_SQ(1..16)_PRP are the IO SQ PRP list addresses for function x. NQM_VF_MODE[VF_MODE] selects the queues and functions that are actually present in the hardware. See NQM_VF_MODE_E.

This CSR should only be written and should only be migrated when this SQ is idle. The corresponding NQM_VF()_SQ()_ENA[ENABLE] is an enable for this SQ. NQM_VF()_SQ()_ENA[ENABLE] describes SQ idle conditions.

When configuring a new NQM_VF()_SQ()_CC[PC]=0 (i.e. not physically-contiguous) SQ, software should write this CSR to configure [PRP] prior to initially enabling the SQ.

When configuring a new NQM_VF()_SQ()_CC[PC]=1 (i.e. physically-contiguous) SQ, then software need not write this CSR.
